long_description_blocks.title: Overview
points: Located in the exclusive Bellapais area, this high-end development features only 12 bespoke Type A villas.
Each offers 4 en-suite bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, and 252 m² of elegant living space on a 500 m² plot + 200 m² landscaped area.

long_description_blocks.title: Unique Selling Points
points: Panoramic Sea & Mountain Views
Private Outdoor Oasis with cinema, BBQ, garden, pool
Smart Infrastructure with gated entry and garage

long_description_blocks.title: Interior Features
points: Premium finishes: 60x120 tiles, laminate bedrooms
Double-sided fireplace, LED lighting, smart wiring
Central VRF HVAC, underfloor heating, solar system

long_description_blocks.title: Energy & Utilities
points: Full insulation, 8m³ water tank, solar booster
Backup generator, EV-charging ready

long_description_blocks.title: Extras & Location
points: Optional basement (gym, cinema, cellar)
2–5 min from Bellapais Abbey, Kyrenia Harbour
~40 min Ercan / ~75 min Larnaca Airport

long_description_blocks.title: Overview
points: Villa Type B offers 212 m² of thoughtfully designed living space — a refined yet more compact version of Type A.
4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms on a 500 m² plot + 200 m² landscaping

long_description_blocks.title: Outdoor & Garden
points: Private pool, garden cinema, fireplace lounge
BBQ area with sink, ambient lighting, garage
Smart gate with license-plate recognition

long_description_blocks.title: Interior Highlights
points: Double-sided fireplace, 4 en-suite bedrooms
VRF air-conditioning, solar-ready infrastructure
Premium 60×120 tiles, laminate, LED lighting
Full smart wiring, pantry, laundry

long_description_blocks.title: Energy & Infrastructure
points: Roof/wall/floor insulation, water booster
8 ton tank, solar collector with heat pump
Backup generator, EV charging ready

long_description_blocks.title: Location & Lifestyle
points: 2–3 min to Bellapais, 5 min Kyrenia Castle
15–20 min to vineyards and golf
~40 min Ercan / ~75 min Larnaca Airport

long_description_blocks.title: Type C – 1+1 Penthouse Loft + Roof Terrace
points: Duplex penthouse with rooftop terrace, combining design, privacy, and luxury.
Developer usage listed as 108 m²; premium version offers 126 m² with extended terrace.
Available: C1-5 to C1-8 – Contact for latest price

long_description_blocks.title: Type D – 1+1 First Floor Apartments
points: Spacious 1-bedroom units ideal for couples or investment.
Left unit: 104 m² (28 m² living room, 16 m² bedroom, 5 m² bath, 3 m² balcony)
Right unit: 113 m² (37 m² living room, 14 m² bedroom, 4 m² bath, 8 m² balcony)
Available: D1-1 / D1-4 – Contact for price; D1-2 / D1-3 – From £160,000 with furniture

long_description_blocks.title: Type D – 1+1 Roof Terrace
points: Private rooftop units perfect for outdoor entertaining.
Terrace sizes: 50 m² and 53 m²
Available: D1-5 to D1-8 – Contact for price

long_description_blocks.title: Type A – 2+1 Garden Floor
points: Ground floor with 2 bedrooms, large terrace — ideal for families or investment.
Total usage: 86.4 m² (80 m² closed area)
Available: A1-1 / A1-2 – Contact for price

long_description_blocks.title: Type A – 2+1 Penthouse with Roof Terrace
points: Luxury penthouse with BBQ area and jacuzzi-ready roof terrace.
Total usage: 164.4 m² (81.5 m² closed area)
Available: A1-3 / A1-4 – Contact for price

long_description_blocks.title: Type B – 3+1 Garden Floor
points: Spacious ground unit with 3 bedrooms — great for families or rental markets.
Total usage: 117.5 m² (28.9 m² living, 15.35 m² kitchen, 3 bedrooms, 2 baths)
Available: B1-1 Garden – Contact for price; B1-2 Garden – £295,000, includes furniture, white goods

long_description_blocks.title: Type B – 3+1 Penthouse with Roof Terrace
points: Ultimate penthouse with expansive roof terrace, ideal for luxury living with private Jacuzzi space and BBQ-ready entertainment zone.

Size breakdown: 28.90 m² living room, 15.35 m² kitchen, 18.33 m² parents' bedroom, 4.88 m² ensuite, 15.05 m² bedroom 2, 14.80 m² bedroom 3, 6.58 m² bathroom, 7.11 m² + 4.00 m² balconies, 2.50 m² hall, 103.89 m² roof terrace.
Total usage: 221.40 m² (117.50 m² closed area)
Available: B1-3 / B1-4 Penthouse – Contact for price

long_description_blocks.title: Overview
points: Modern apartment unit designed for comfort and functionality.
Ideal for both residential living and investment opportunities.

long_description_blocks.title: Interior & Layout
points: Includes 1 or 2 bedrooms with contemporary bathrooms.
Open-plan kitchen and living area with modern fittings.
Access to private balcony or terrace.

long_description_blocks.title: Community Features
points: Access to amenities such as fitness studio, swimming pool, and nearby shops.
On-site security and dedicated parking.

long_description_blocks.title: Pricing & Documentation
points: Pricing varies by unit — contact for current availability.
Pricing documents available for download.
